product_name: Novara Mudster Double Bike Shorts - Boys'
long_description: The Novara Mudster double bike shorts for boys hold up to the wear and tear that kids dish out. Their mesh liner shorts and built-in chamois provide comfort on the bike. Sturdy nylon outer shorts endure heavy use and resist abrasion. Mesh liner shorts enhance ventilation for cooling and feature a built-in chamois pad for comfort; silicone gripper elastic at the hems helps keep shorts from riding up. Partial elastic waistband with belt loops and a zipper fly with snap closure help ensure a comfortable fit. The Novara Mudster double bike shorts feature 2 front hand pockets and zippered vents at the side seams.
